metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6520 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 allows remote attackers to bypass an openredirect protection mechanism via crafted authority data in a URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
